name: Retro Flappy
description:
The objective in the game is to earn as many points as possible, controlling a personage without letting it crash into the obestaculos. If the character touches an obstacle - or if the personage falls - the game is over. Whenever the character passes through a set of obstacles, the player gains a point.

Credit sprites - VEXED 

https://v3x3d.itch.io
